net.i2p.crypto.elgamal

Class ElGamalSigEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SignatureSpi
      • java.security.Signature
        • net.i2p.crypto.elgamal.ElGamalSigEngine

  • public final class ElGamalSigEngine
extends Signature
    ElG signatures with SHA-256 ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ElGamal_signature_scheme
    Since:
    0.9.25

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.security.Signature

        SIGN, state, UNINITIALIZED, VERIFY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElGamalSigEngine()
      No specific hash requested, allows any ElGamal key.
      ElGamalSigEngine(MessageDigest digest)
      Specific hash requested, only matching keys will be allowed.

      • ElGamalSigEngine

        public ElGamalSigEngine(MessageDigest digest)
        Specific hash requested, only matching keys will be allowed.
        Parameters:
        digest - the hash algorithm that keys must have to sign or verify.
